summary: Privilege separation configuration issue in specific OpenSSH server versions.
remediation: Upgrade OpenSSH to a vendor-supported patched release and review sshd privilege separation settings.

summary: Resolver off-by-one vulnerability affecting DNS response processing.
remediation: Upgrade to patched nginx versions and restrict resolver trust boundaries.

summary: Path normalization flaw in Apache HTTP Server 2.4.49 and some 2.4.50 deployments.
remediation: Upgrade Apache HTTP Server to 2.4.51 or later and enforce hardened path handling controls.
